treatment.description: Leaf blade subterete, straight, equaling or shorter than scape, 1 mm wide or less. Scape 15–30 cm. Umbel loose, 10–30-flowered; spathe bracts 3, apex obtuse or acute. Flowers 4–6 mm; tepals white to pale pink with deep pink or purple midribs; pedicel 4–15 mm. 2n = 14.
treatment.discussion: Allium lacunosum var. micranthum is known only from the inner south Coast and Transverse ranges.
